serverInfo.name: deskbird
serverInfo.description: Workplace management with deskbird: read bookings, desks and schedules; filter by date range and paginate efficiently. Automate occupancy insights, reservations and attendance reporting using the deskbird plugin with delegated user context.

instructions:
Always use deskbird with a lowercase 'd'.
Filter /bookings by startDate and endDate.
Use limit 100 per request (max 500, but responses are large).
